data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sak, Serdar, Karaytuğ, Süphan, Huys, Rony (2008): A review of Pseudoleptomesochrella Lang, 1965 (Copepoda, Harpacticoida, Ameiridae), including a redescription of P. halophila (Noodt, 1952) from the Black Sea and a key to species. Zootaxa 1758: 45-60, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.181887
